Sentencas: An alkali-free, alkaline earth borosilicate glass (designated G73) has been developed as a viscous sealant for use with solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel

Sentencas: In this work, the interfacial interactions that occur between this viscous sealant and aluminized ferritic stainless steel (SS441) under SOFC operational conditions are described.
Titulo: Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel

Sentencas: YSZ/glass/aluminized SS441 sandwich seals were held at 800 degrees C in air for up to 1000 h, and the interfaces were analyzed using analytical scanning electron microscopy (ASEM).
Titulo: Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel

Sentencas: Interfacial reactions were also characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD) analyses of heat-treated mixtures of glass and alumina powders.
Titulo: Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel

Sentencas: The results show that the glass reacted with aluminum from the steel to form BaAl2Si2O8 crystals at the glass/metal interface and that the aluminum concentration in the aluminized steel was significantly depleted with time.
Titulo: Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel
Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel
Interfacial interactions between an alkali-free borosilicate viscous sealing glass and aluminized ferritic stainless steel
